original: This save was created playing a Featured Ruler
translation: 这个存档创建时使用的是特色统治者。

original: The Featured Ruler is a time limited, specially selected character for you to play
translation: 特色统治者是在一段时间内特别挑选供你游玩的角色

original: A magical garb bestowing the wearer with the arcane power of the unicorns of ancient times.
translation: 一件神奇的装束，能赋予穿戴者古代独角兽的神秘力量。

original: One of the Heavenly Twins, or the Divine Messenger could inhabit this temple.
translation: 双子神中的一位或者神使可以居住于此。

original: Dedicate the temple of §Y[scoped_temple_barony.GetName]§! to one of the gods of prosperity: §Y[GetHestiaVestaName]§!, §Y[GetDemetraCeresName]§! or §Y[GetAphroditeVenusName]§!.
translation: 将§Y[scoped_temple_barony.GetName]§!神庙献予一位繁荣之神：§Y[GetHestiaVestaName]§!，§Y[GetDemetraCeresName]§!或§Y[GetAphroditeVenusName]§!。

original: Dedicate the temple of §Y[scoped_temple_barony.GetName]§! to either one of the sons of Leto: §YApollo§! or §Y[GetArtemisDianaName]§!, or the Divine Messenger, §Y[GetHermesMercuryName]§!.
translation: 将§Y[scoped_temple_barony.GetName]§!神庙献予勒托之子：§Y阿波罗§!或§Y[GetArtemisDianaName]§!，或者神使§Y[GetHermesMercuryName]§!。

original: Several Hellenic gods are associated with earth and prosperity. [GetDemetraCeresName] oversees the harvest, [GetAphroditeVenusName] is associated with fertility, and [GetHestiaVestaName], one of the most beloved Roman goddesses, to hearth and family.
translation: 几位希腊神明被与土地、繁荣联系在一起。[GetDemetraCeresName]负责丰收，[GetAphroditeVenusName]负责生育，而[GetHestiaVestaName]负责健康与家庭，是最受欢迎的罗马诸神之一。

original: Apollo takes a very prestigious spot in Hellenic mythology, being associated with reason, arts and medicine. His twin sister [GetArtemisDianaName] on the other hand tends to have humbler, more secretive followers, being associated with night and nature. Finally, [GetHermesMercuryName] is the messenger of the gods, associated with roads, trading and, sometimes, trickery and theft. [GetPrincelyElectorsList]
translation: 阿波罗在希腊神话中享有崇高的声望，被认为是代表理性、艺术与医药的神明。他的双胞胎姐妹[GetArtemisDianaName]则与之相反，行事谦逊低调，有着更隐秘的追随者，代表黑夜与自然。然后是神使[GetHermesMercuryName]，代表道路、贸易，有时也是欺骗与盗窃之神。

original: The Emperor and the seven Prince-Electors can nominate a successor from among themselves, any legitimate children and siblings of the ruler, as well as any other major De Jure vassal of the Empire, as long as they share the same religion with the current Emperor. If an historical elector title is held by infidels or does not exist, another dejure vassal will take its place. If the Empire is run under §YPapal Investiture§! or by a §YDogmatic§! religion, the Prince-Bishops hold a greater sway over the election. [GetPrincelyElectorsList]
translation: 皇帝，连同七位选帝侯可以从他们自己、自己的合法子女、兄弟姐妹以及帝国的主要法理诸侯中提名一位继承人，这名继承人需要与现任皇帝有共同的信仰。如果历史上的选帝侯头衔持有者为异教徒或不存在，另一名法理上的封臣将取而代之。如果帝国拥有§Y教宗神职叙任制§!或主流信仰有§Y「教条」§!性质，采邑主教将会在选举中有更大权重。[GetPrincelyElectorsList]

original: The §YHistorical Elector Titles§! of the [e_hre.GetName] are the Counties of [hre_title_1_per.GetName], [hre_title_2_per.GetName] and [hre_title_3_per.GetName], and the Duchies of [hre_title_4_per.GetName], [hre_title_5_per.GetName], [hre_title_6_per.GetName] and [hre_title_7_per.GetName].
translation: [e_hre.GetName]的§Y历史选帝侯头衔§!分别为[hre_title_1_per.GetName]伯爵、[hre_title_2_per.GetName]伯爵、[hre_title_3_per.GetName]伯爵、[hre_title_4_per.GetName]公爵、[hre_title_5_per.GetName]公爵、[hre_title_6_per.GetName]公爵以及[hre_title_7_per.GetName]公爵。

original: [From.GetFirstName] is a cunning politician with high §YIntrigue§!
translation: [From.GetFirstName]是一名拥有高§Y密谋§!的狡猾的政治家

original: Both [From.GetFirstName] and [Root.GetFirstName] are relatives and belong to a §YBloodline§! endorsed by the §YPapacy§!
translation: [From.GetFirstName]与[Root.GetFirstName]都是亲戚，都属于§Y教廷§!支持的§Y血脉§!

original:
As the sword of Temporal power was entrusted to the Emperor of the Romans by the Holy See, so it can be withdrawn.
By besmirching the dignity of [defeated_emperor.GetHerHis] sacred charge, [defeated_emperor.GetTitledFirstName] brought upon [defeated_emperor.GetHerselfHimself] the just retribution of Our Lord. As the humble instrument of His divine wrath, I was able to lead my troops to victory against this heretic, and so thorough was [defeated_emperor.GetHerHis] defeat that [defeated_emperor.GetSheHe] was forced to recognize me as Imperial Vicar of Italy, abandoning in all but name [defeated_emperor.GetHerHis] claim over the peninsula.

As a reward for my devotion to the Church, [scoped_pope.GetTitledFirstName] has offered to recognize in perpetuity the role of my dynasty as protector of the Holy See.
translation:
既然是圣座将世俗权力授予了罗马人的皇帝，那么圣座自然可以将其收回。
[defeated_emperor.GetTitledFirstName]败坏了[defeated_emperor.GetHerHis]神圣职责的尊严，让[defeated_emperor.GetHerselfHimself]受到了我主的正义报应。我作为祂神圣愤怒的谦卑工具带领军队对抗这个异端，而[defeated_emperor.GetHerHis]惨败迫使[defeated_emperor.GetSheHe]承认我为帝国的意大利宗座代牧，放弃[defeated_emperor.GetHerHis]对整个半岛事实上的宣称权。

为了奖励我对教会的贡献，[scoped_pope.GetTitledFirstName]愿意永久承认我的家族为圣座的守护者。

original:
As the sword of Temporal power was entrusted to the Emperor of the Romans by the Holy See, so it can be withdrawn.
By besmirching the dignity of [defeated_emperor.GetHerHis] sacred charge, [defeated_emperor.GetTitledFirstName] brought upon [defeated_emperor.GetHerselfHimself] the just retribution of Our Lord. As the humble instrument of His divine wrath, I was able to lead my troops to victory against this heretic, putting an end to [defeated_emperor.GetHerHis] blasphemy.

As a reward for my devotion to the Church, [scoped_pope.GetTitledFirstName] has offered to recognize in perpetuity the role of my dynasty as protector of the Holy See.
translation:
既然是圣座将世俗权力授予了罗马人的皇帝，那么圣座自然可以将其收回。
[defeated_emperor.GetTitledFirstName]败坏了[defeated_emperor.GetHerHis]神圣职责的尊严，让[defeated_emperor.GetHerselfHimself]受到了我主的正义报应。我作为祂神圣愤怒的谦卑工具带领军队对抗这个异端，制止了[defeated_emperor.GetHerHis]渎神暴行。

为了奖励我对教会的贡献，[scoped_pope.GetTitledFirstName]愿意永久承认我的家族为圣座的守护者。

original: This was but the Lord's triumph, I cannot accept this honor.
translation: 这是主的胜利，我不能受此殊荣。

original:
Thanks to the stubbornness of the petty Lords of Italy, my conflict against the Holy See has come to a humiliating conclusion. 

The armies of [From.GetTitledFirstName] have defeated my own forces time and again, forcing me not only to recognize the supremacy of the Church over the secular Throne, but to appoint [From.GetFirstName] Imperial Vicar of Italy, relinquishing my rightful claim over the peninsula in all but name.

With this victory, [scoped_pope.GetTitledFirstName] has likely reaffirmed the power of the Vatican over the Empire for generations to come.
translation:
由于意大利小领主的顽固抵抗，我与圣座的冲突有了耻辱的结果。

[From.GetTitledFirstName]的军队一次又一次击败了我自己的部队，迫使我不仅要承认教权高于世俗权力，还要将[From.GetFirstName]任命为帝国的意大利宗座代牧，放弃我对整个半岛事实上的正当宣称权。

凭借这次胜利，[scoped_pope.GetTitledFirstName]可能会重申梵蒂冈对未来几代帝国的影响力。

original:
My conflict against the Holy See has come to a humiliating conclusion, in no small part due to the interference of the [From.GetTitle] of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. 

The armies of [From.GetTitledFirstName] have defeated my own forces time and again, forcing me to sue for peace and recognize in clear terms my submission to the Church's authority.

With this victory, [scoped_pope.GetTitledFirstName] has likely reaffirmed the primacy of the Vatican over the Empire for generations to come.
translation:
我与圣座的冲突有了耻辱的结果，这在很大程度上是由于[From.PrimaryTitle.GetName][From.GetTitle]的干涉。

[From.GetTitledFirstName]的军队一次又一次击败了我自己的部队，迫使我乞和并明确地承认我对教会权威的服从。

凭借这次胜利，[scoped_pope.GetTitledFirstName]可能会重申梵蒂冈对未来几代帝国的优越地位。

original:
[defeated_emperor.GetTitledFirstName]'s conflict against the Holy See has come to a humiliating conclusion, in no small part due to the interference of the [From.GetTitle] of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName].

The armies of [From.GetTitledFirstName] have defeated the [defeated_emperor.GetTitle]'s forces time and again, forcing [defeated_emperor.GetHerHim] to sue for peace and recognize in clear terms [defeated_emperor.GetHerHis] submission to the Church's authority, as well as relinquish [defeated_emperor.GetHerHis] claim of direct dominion over Italy.

With this victory, [scoped_pope.GetTitledFirstName] has likely reaffirmed the primacy of the Vatican over the Empire for generations to come.
translation:
[defeated_emperor.GetTitledFirstName]与圣座的冲突有了耻辱的结果，这在很大程度上是由于[From.PrimaryTitle.GetName][From.GetTitle]的干涉。

[From.GetTitledFirstName]的军队一次又一次击败了[defeated_emperor.GetTitle]的部队，迫使[defeated_emperor.GetHerHim]乞和并明确地承认[defeated_emperor.GetHerHis]对教会权威的服从，还要放弃[defeated_emperor.GetHerHis]对意大利的直接统治。

凭借这次胜利，[scoped_pope.GetTitledFirstName]可能会重申梵蒂冈对未来几代帝国的优越地位。

original:
[defeated_emperor.GetTitledFirstName]'s conflict against the Holy See has come to a humiliating conclusion, in no small part due to the interference of the [From.GetTitle] of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName].

The armies of [From.GetTitledFirstName] have defeated the [defeated_emperor.GetTitle]'s forces time and again, forcing [defeated_emperor.GetHerHim] to sue for peace and recognize in clear terms [defeated_emperor.GetHerHis] submission to the Church's authority.

With this victory, [scoped_pope.GetTitledFirstName] has likely reaffirmed the primacy of the Vatican over the Empire for generations to come.
translation:
[defeated_emperor.GetTitledFirstName]与圣座的冲突有了耻辱的结果，这在很大程度上是由于[From.PrimaryTitle.GetName][From.GetTitle]的干涉。

[From.GetTitledFirstName]的军队一次又一次击败了[defeated_emperor.GetTitle]的部队，迫使[defeated_emperor.GetHerHim]乞和并明确地承认[defeated_emperor.GetHerHis]对教会权威的服从。

凭借这次胜利，[scoped_pope.GetTitledFirstName]可能会重申梵蒂冈对未来几代帝国的优越地位。

original: It was bound to happen sooner or later...
Easier to Order relatives to take Vows
By defending the integrity and dignity of the Holy See against its enemies, [This.GetTitledFirstName]'s has forever bound its fate to the Vatican.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]与圣座的敌人对抗，捍卫圣座的完整与尊严，其命运已永远与梵蒂冈紧紧相连。

original: By defending the integrity and dignity of the Holy See against its enemies, [This.GetTitledFirstName]'s has forever bound its fate to the Vatican.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]与圣座的敌人对抗，捍卫圣座的完整与尊严，其命运已永远与梵蒂冈紧紧相连。

original: By defending the integrity and dignity of the Holy See against its enemies, [This.GetTitledFirstName]'s has forever bound its fate to the Vatican.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]与圣座的敌人对抗，捍卫圣座的完整与尊严，其命运已永远与梵蒂冈紧紧相连。

original: An idyllic collection of fields and meadows, perfect for any type of animal!
translation: 田园牧歌般的田野和草甸，适合任何类型的动物！

original: The animals have won, and humanity is but a memory.
translation: 动物们大获全胜，人类已成往事。

original: Enable to make the title follow the short name naming convention and be presented without the "tier of" prefix.
translation: 允许遵照短名称命名法命名头衔，不显示头衔等级。

original: Ignores religious differences when attempting to arrange a marriage or take a consort
translation: 安排婚姻与纳妾时忽视宗教差异

original: $HOLY_SITE|Y$ becomes a Holy Site of the $RELIGION|Y$ religion
$HOLY_SITE|Y$ is no longer a Holy Site of the $RELIGION|Y$ religion
$HOLY_SITE|Y$ becomes a Holy Site of the $RELIGION|Y$ religion and its heresies
$HOLY_SITE|Y$ is no longer a Holy Site of the $RELIGION|Y$ religion and its heresies
$FOR|Y$'s supply limit in $PROVINCE|Y$ with $LEADER|Y$ leading their troops is $COMPARISON$ $VALUE|Y$

I wake up in the middle of the night by a heavy draft coming from my now open window. A hooded figure, frozen like a statue, standing next to my bed proclaims that it has been sighted in my stars a prophecy!
translation: 夜半时分，一阵劲风从敞开的窗口吹醒了我。在我的床边站着一个穿着罩袍的身影，如雕像般肃穆，向我告知在我的星座里看到了预言！

original: According to the prophecy I should look for further signs up in the mountains.
translation: 预言说我应当去山中寻求进一步的预兆。
卫兵！抓住这个闯进来的疯子！

original: Exhausted, frozen, and worn out I finally reach a peak in the mountains. Just as my mind is filling up with doubts about my own sanity trusting a strangers foretold prophecy, a bright light shoots across the sky and comes crashing down in the forest at the roots of the mountain.
translation: 我又累又冻，筋疲力竭，但最终还是爬上了顶峰。我的脑海正在不断怀疑自己的理智，居然会相信一个陌生人的预言，突然间，一道明亮的光芒划过天空，落向了山脚下的森林。

original: I must follow the signs of the prophecy
translation: 我必须跟随预言中的预兆

original: Follow the light – wherever it takes you.
translation: 跟上那道光——不惜一切代价。

original: Head home to gather a search party before heading out to the woods.
translation: 回家召集搜索队然后出发去森林。

original: The words are still haunting me in my dreams. My mind just can't let go of the fairytale prophecy the lunatic driveled in my private quarters many nights ago.
translation: 那些话在梦中仍然困扰着我。前几夜那个疯子在我的寝室说的那通胡言乱语，我至今也无法释怀。

original: My sanity is at stake – I need to see this through
translation: 我的理智危在旦夕——我需要探究到底

original: Head out for the mountains in the prophecy.
My mind has been poisoned - this is clearly a trap!
translation: 我的思维被毒害了——这显然是一个陷阱！

original: You do not trust even your own instincts right now.
translation: 当下你连自己的直觉都不能信任。

original: After trudging through the thick forest the whole day and evening I reach a moonlit glade late in the night. At the end of the glade there's a small pond shining in silver. Next to the pond lies a lustrous body suspended in time. Except for the small and steady stream of blood that's still seeping out from a cut under the belly, the grandiose being of a unicorn could have just as well been sleeping from eternity and beyond - a mesmerizing sight. Without any option to re-animate this wonder of nature I'm left with a difficult choice of what to do since the carcass is too heavy to bring home as a whole.
translation: 我整日整夜地跋涉，穿过茂密的森林，在深夜到达月光下的一片林间空地。空地尽头有片小池塘，闪着银色的光芒。池塘边有一具仿佛在时间中凝固的光亮尸体。除了仍然从腹部伤口渗出的汩汩血流，这头巨大的独角兽简直就像在永恒和超越中进行着安眠——真是神奇的景象。我无法让这自然的瑰丽造物重焕生机，而重到无法完整带回家的尸体又让我左右为难。

original: Cup your hands and start drinking the blood
Cut the horn and bring it home

Arriving at the forest a week later, we spent days thoroughly searching it for any clues to the bright light that fell from the sky. Despite the fact that nothing turned out of the expedition, the light in the sky still has to mean something
translation: 一周后我们到达森林，花了几天时间彻底搜索从天而降的亮光的线索。尽管考察没有什么结果，但天空中的光线必定有着某种意义

original: A sign of a blessing upon my rule
translation: 这是我的统治受保佑的预兆

original: I can't even tell if it was reality or just a dream any more, but ever since I visited the unicorn glade I have seen something glimmering when I've caught my own reflection in other people's eyes.
translation: 我甚至不知道这是真是幻，但自从我去过独角兽的林间空地后，我发现自己在他人眼中的影像更加闪烁。

original: And they now seem to hold me in a higher regard
translation: 他们现在似乎更关注我了

original: A faint glimmering aura is surrounding this character
translation: 这个角色围绕着微弱的闪烁光环

original: A lustrous decoration for any activity of festivities, big and small alike.
translation: 不论庆典隆重与否，这都是一件奢华的装饰。

original: A faint shade of silver can be seen flowing through the veins of this character
translation: 可以看到一股微弱的银色流经这个角色的血管

original: Not even trusting themselves might sometimes be the best survival strategy
translation: 连自己都不相信有时可能是最好的生存策略

original: These stables allow ruler to maintain a force of Stratiotet, elite Arberian light cavalry.
translation: 这些马厩允许领主维护一队佣兵——精锐的阿尔贝里亚轻骑兵。

original: We have occupied the entire §YDuchy of [Root.GetBaseName]§!. \n\nIf we so wish, we could settle some of our men in the area, take control of the Duchy and create a Crusader State.
translation: 我们占领了整个§Y[Root.GetBaseName]公国§!。\n\n如果我们需要，可以让我们的士兵在此驻扎，控制这个公国并创建一个十字军王国。

original: Occupy all De-Jure County titles of §Y[Root.GetFullBaseName]§!
translation: 占领§Y[Root.GetFullBaseName]§!的所有法理伯爵领

original: All De-Jure County title owners must be fighting the Crusade
translation: 所有法理伯爵领头衔拥有者都必须在参加十字军

original: Is by the sea or neighboring a non-heretical Christian
translation: 沿海或与非异端基督教领主接壤

original: Have a §YCrusade Beneficiary§! or someone who has the potential to become a §YCrusade Beneficiary§!
translation: 有§Y十字军受益人§!或有潜在的§Y十字军受益人§!

original: The §Y[Root.GetFullBaseName]§! is not De-Jure of the current Crusade target
translation: §Y[Root.GetFullBaseName]§!不是当前十字军目标的法理领土

original: None of the DeJure County title are held by the Crusade target or its vassals
translation: 十字军目标及其封臣未持有任一法理伯爵领头衔

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! abdicates all [Root.GetHerHis] old titles to settle down in §Y[duchy_region.GetBaseName]§!
I will leave [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] behind to settle down in [duchy_region.GetBaseName] personally.

The [From.Religion.GetGroupName] Crusaders have taken [duchy_region.GetBaseName] and settled their soldiers around the area. Though the Crusade for [crusade_title.GetName] is still ongoing, the area around [duchy_region.GetBaseName] is indisputably in the hands of [From.GetTitledName].\n\nThe Crusaders are emboldened and supported by the selfless [From.GetDynName], who abdicated all [From.GetHerHis] old titles to settle down in [duchy_region.GetBaseName] and take the fight to the heathens. It is only a matter of time before the rest of the [crusade_target_ruler.Religion.GetGroupName] realms will fall.
translation: [From.Religion.GetGroupName]十字军已经拿下了[duchy_region.GetBaseName]并且在当地驻扎了大量的士兵。虽然本次[crusade_title.GetName]十字军依然在进行中，但是[duchy_region.GetBaseName]周遭地区已经毫无疑问地掌握在[From.GetTitledName]手中。\n\n[From.GetDynName]放弃了[From.GetHerHis]全部旧头衔驻扎在[duchy_region.GetBaseName]来对抗异教徒，令十字军将士们深受鼓舞。其余[crusade_target_ruler.Religion.GetGroupName]领地的陷落只是时间问题。

original: You will now play as §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! instead of §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§!

translation: 建立§Y十字军王国§!§G花费更少§!

original: [sway_target.GetTitledFirstName] has secluded [sway_target.GetHerselfHimself] with the rest of the court in [sway_target.Location.GetName], presumably biding their time while disease lingers in the countryside of the realm. "It will not be possible to reach [sway_target.GetHerHim] for some time", my council informs me.
translation: 在病魔徘徊在领地的乡村之际，[sway_target.GetTitledFirstName][sway_target.GetHerselfHimself]已经和[sway_target.Location.GetName]宫廷中其他人一起进入隔离等待时机。「这段时间不可能联系得到[sway_target.GetHerHim]了。」我的内阁告诉我。

original: As I have gone into seclusion with my court, my efforts to appease [sway_target.GetTitledFirstName] will have to be halted.
translation: 由于我已经与我的宫廷一同进入隔离，我必须停止拉拢[sway_target.GetTitledFirstName]的努力。

original: As both [sway_target.GetTitledFirstName] and I are both currently weathering the disease ravaging the countryside outside, my efforts to sway [sway_target.GetHerHis] opinion of me will have to be put on hold...
translation: 由于[sway_target.GetTitledFirstName]和我现在都在等待肆虐外面乡村的病魔消退，我拉拢[sway_target.GetHerHis]好感的努力将不得不搁置……

original: [target_courtier.GetBestName] may not be the most attractive [target_courtier.GetManWoman] I ever laid my eyes upon, but as the days crawl by in the [Root.GetCapitalHolding], I rack my brain for ways to convince [target_courtier.GetHerHim] of my good intentions. Now, I find the [target_courtier.GetManWoman] occupying my thoughts more often than not.
translation: [target_courtier.GetBestName]也许不是我见过的[target_courtier.GetManWoman]里最吸引我的，但随着[Root.GetCapitalHolding]里的日子一天天过去，我绞尽脑汁想让[target_courtier.GetHerHim]相信我的善意。现在我发现那个[target_courtier.GetManWoman]经常占据我的脑海。

original: When I confessed my feelings to [target_courtier.GetTitledFirstName], it seemed to catch [target_courtier.GetHerHim] off guard. I almost had time to regret my decision, but then [target_courtier.GetSheHe] smiled, took my hand, and led me away...\nAs [target_courtier.GetSheHe] leaves my chambers this morning, I have a feeling it is not the last time.
translation: 我向[target_courtier.GetTitledFirstName]的表白似乎打动了[target_courtier.GetHerHim]。我差点就反悔了，但[target_courtier.GetSheHe]笑了笑，握住我的手，带走了我……\n当[target_courtier.GetSheHe]今天早上离开我的房间时，我有预感这不会是最后一次。

original: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! must not be a concubine or consort
Blasphemers must die, but libraries contain knowledge...
translation: 渎神者必须死，但图书馆的知识是无罪的……

original: Has NOT recently refused a challenge (Expires: [This.has_recently_declined_duel_cooldown.GetExpiryDate])

This stone axe strongly resembles the axe of Perkunas himself, as described in myth. While a prestigious artifact in itself, merely holding it seems to also instill military confidence and bravado in its wielder...
translation: 这把石斧酷似佩尔库纳斯本人的斧头，正如神话中所描述的那样。虽然它本身就是一个着名的神器，但仅仅拿着它似乎也能给持有者灌输军事上的自信与强硬……

original: Go back to look at your other options.
translation: 回去看看你的其他选项。

original: The whole area is filled with people, looking like they come from all the different corners of the world. I never knew [pilgrimage_destination.province_saint.GetFirstNameWithNick] was this popular or well known. Though it is stressful, I finally get my moment to stand in front of the grave, and feel the blessed aura of the Saint.
translation: 这里人山人海，可以看得出大家都是从世界各地赶来的。我真是没想到[pilgrimage_destination.province_saint.GetFirstNameWithNick]竟然会这么有名。虽然压力不小，我最终还是得以在墓前好好感受了一番圣人那满是祝福的气息。

original: There is a couple of other pilgrims around, but they all look relatively local to the area. I walk over to the grave and look down at the small statue of the saint, as well as the stone commemorating [pilgrimage_destination.province_saint.GetHerHis] life. It has been a long journey, and I finally get to gaze upon the blessed burial site of [pilgrimage_destination.province_saint.GetFirstNameWithNick].
translation: 周围只有零零散散的几个朝圣者，看起来也都是本地人。我走向了那坟墓，细细观看着坟前那尊小小的圣人像以及一块铭刻着[pilgrimage_destination.province_saint.GetHerHis]生平的石头。这一路真是颇为漫长，现在我终于见到[pilgrimage_destination.province_saint.GetFirstNameWithNick]的蒙福墓地了。

original: The burial site is completely void of people, not a single soul to be seen, and I have to search to spot the small grave. Overgrown and deserted as it is, I take it upon myself to tidy the place up before I finally sit down in prayer to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]. It is almost as if [pilgrimage_destination.province_saint.GetFirstNameWithNick] is here, praying with me.
translation: 墓地附近一个人都没有，我找了一会儿才看见那座小小的坟茔。坟前杂草丛生、久已荒废，于是我便花了点时间动手清理了这地方，然后坐下向[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]献上了祷告。我隐隐觉得[pilgrimage_destination.province_saint.GetFirstNameWithNick]似乎就在我身边，与我一同祷告。

original:
§Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§! gains the trait §YBerserker§! giving:
Martial: §G+4§!
Diplomacy: §R-2§!
Personal Combat Skill: §G+25§!
Same Trait Opinion: §G+10§!

[GetBerserkerDecisionExtras]
translation:
§Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§!获得特质§Y狂战士§!，效果如下：
军事：§G+4§!
外交：§R-2§!
个人实战能力：§G+25§!
相同特质好感：§G+10§!

[GetBerserkerDecisionExtras]

original: This action is bound to affect your personality:\n[GetBerserkerDecisionTraitChanges]\n
translation: 这一行为势必会影响你的个性：\n[GetBerserkerDecisionTraitChanges]\n

original: §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§! gains the traits §YWroth§! and §YAggressive Leader§!, and loses §YDefender§!\n
translation: §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§!获得特质§Y易怒§!与§Y好战者§!，失去特质§Y守卫者§!\n

original: §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§! loses the traits §YPatient§! and §YDefender§!, and gains §YAggressive Leader§!\n
translation: §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§!失去特质§Y耐心§!与§Y守卫者§!，获得特质§Y好战者§!\n

original: §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§! loses the traits §YPatient§! and §YDefender§!, and gains §YAggressive Leader§!\n
translation: §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§!失去特质§Y耐心§!与§Y守卫者§!，获得特质§Y好战者§!\n

original: §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§! loses the trait §YPatient§!, and gains §YAggressive Leader§!\n
translation: §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§!失去特质§Y耐心§!，获得特质§Y好战者§!\n

original: §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§! gains the trait §YAggressive Leader§! and loses §YDefender§!\n
translation: §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§!获得特质§Y好战者§!，失去特质§Y守卫者§!\n

original: My [From.GetJobTitle] has discovered a [found_commander.GetManWoman] of great military talent, called [found_commander.GetFirstName], who is willing to serve in my ranks!
translation: 我的[From.GetJobTitle]发现了一名具有杰出军事才能的[found_commander.GetManWoman]，这位叫做[found_commander.GetFirstName]的人愿意在我的部队服务！

original: The $BLOODLINE|Y$ bloodline is NOT active for $ACTOR|Y$

[From.GetFirstName], the great [From.GetKingQueen] of the Greeks, is distraught over the poor mettle of [From.GetHerHis] countrymen. Knowing well our skill in battle, [From.GetSheHe] has decided to form a bodyguard consisting solely of Norse warriors.\n\nThose who serve [From.GetHerHim] in the great city of Miklagård are generously rewarded, and even now many of our young men, eager for riches and adventure, have departed for Greece to pick up [From.GetHerHis] banner.
translation: 希腊人的伟大[From.GetKingQueen][From.GetFirstName]对[From.GetHerHis]子民的可怜气概感到担忧。[From.GetSheHe]熟知我们的战斗能力，已决定组建一支仅由诺斯战士组成的卫队。\n\n在「伟大之城」米克拉加德向[From.GetHerHim]效忠的人们获得了慷慨的奖励，现在我们中的很多向往财富和冒险的年轻男人已经前往希腊举起[From.GetHerHis]旗帜了。

original: [From.GetFirstName], the great [From.GetKingQueen] of the Greeks, is distraught over the poor mettle of [From.GetHerHis] countrymen. Knowing well our skill in battle, [From.GetSheHe] has decided to form a bodyguard consisting solely of Norse warriors.\n\nThose who serve [From.GetHerHim] in the great city of Miklagård are generously rewarded, and even now many of our young men and women, eager for riches and adventure, have departed for Greece to pick up [From.GetHerHis] banner.
translation: 希腊人的伟大[From.GetKingQueen][From.GetFirstName]对[From.GetHerHis]子民的可怜气概感到担忧。[From.GetSheHe]熟知我们的战斗能力，已决定组建一支仅由诺斯战士组成的卫队。\n\n在「伟大之城」米克拉加德向[From.GetHerHim]效忠的人们获得了慷慨的奖励，现在我们中的很多向往财富和冒险的年轻男女已经前往希腊举起[From.GetHerHis]旗帜了。

original: [From.GetFirstName], the great [From.GetKingQueen] of the Greeks, is distraught over the poor mettle of [From.GetHerHis] countrymen. Knowing well our skill in battle, [From.GetSheHe] has decided to form a bodyguard consisting solely of Norse warriors.\n\nThose who serve [From.GetHerHim] in the great city of Miklagård are generously rewarded, and even now many of our young women, eager for riches and adventure, have departed for Greece to pick up [From.GetHerHis] banner.
translation: 希腊人的伟大[From.GetKingQueen][From.GetFirstName]对[From.GetHerHis]子民的可怜气概感到担忧。[From.GetSheHe]熟知我们的战斗能力，已决定组建一支仅由诺斯战士组成的卫队。\n\n在「伟大之城」米克拉加德向[From.GetHerHim]效忠的人们获得了慷慨的奖励，现在我们中的很多向往财富和冒险的年轻女人已经前往希腊举起[From.GetHerHis]旗帜了。

original: My [my_child.GetSonDaughter], [my_child.GetTitledFirstName], has decided to enlist with the Varangian Guard in Miklagård and seek [my_child.GetHerHis] fortune there! Although [my_child.GetSheHe] will no doubt gain both riches and valuable battle experience in service of the Greek [greek_king_or_queen.GetKingQueen], there will be many perils that could well cost [my_child.GetHerHim] [my_child.GetHerHis] life.
translation: 我的[my_child.GetSonDaughter][my_child.GetTitledFirstName]已经决定试试[my_child.GetHerHis]运气，响应米克拉加德的募兵参加瓦良吉卫队！毫无疑问[my_child.GetSheHe]能够通过效忠希腊[greek_king_or_queen.GetKingQueen]得到财富和宝贵的战场经验，但这也是一种冒险，一不小心就会让[my_child.GetHerHim]把[my_child.GetHerHis]命搭进去。

original: Go to Miklagård and make me proud, [my_child.GetSonDaughter].
translation: 去米克拉加德吧，[my_child.GetSonDaughter]，让我为你骄傲。

original: A grizzled old warrior having just returned from Greece arrived with a message from [From.GetTitledFirstName] today. Though [From.GetSheHe] has left the Varangian Guard, my [From.GetSonDaughter] has apparently found [From.GetHerselfHimself] a Greek [From.GetHusbandWifeOpp] and decided to remain in Miklagård and build a new life there. "It is doubtful we will ever see [From.GetHerHim] again, my [Root.GetLordLady]."
translation: 今天一个头发花白的老兵带着[From.GetTitledFirstName]的消息从希腊回来了。尽管[From.GetSheHe]已经离开了瓦兰吉卫队，但我的[From.GetSonDaughter]已经为[From.GetHerselfHimself]找了一个希腊[From.GetHusbandWifeOpp]，决定留在米克拉加德开始新生活。「不知道我们以后还能不能见到[From.GetHerHim]了，我的[Root.GetLordLady]。」

original: After finishing [From.GetHerHis] service with the Varangian Guard, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has married a local [From.GetManWomanOpp] and decided to remain in Constantinople instead of returning home to the barbaric frozen wasteland [From.GetSheHe] once came from. [From.GetSheHeCap] has pledged [From.GetHerHis] continued service to me.
translation: 完成了[From.GetHerHis]瓦兰吉卫队的服役之后，[From.GetTitledFirstName]和一个当地[From.GetManWomanOpp]结了婚，决定不再回到[From.GetSheHe]冰冷而野蛮的荒凉故土，而是留在君士坦丁堡。[From.GetSheHeCap]发誓[From.GetHerHis]效劳将会继续下去。

original: A heavily scarred warrior clad in strange armor approaches my throne, and before [From.GetSheHe] can be disarmed, the stranger relieves my guard of their spear in a swift, fluid motion and tosses it aside. Other guards hurry forward, but I raise my hand to stop them. The stranger is [From.GetTitledFirstName], at last returned from Greece!
translation: 一个满身伤痕的战士穿着陌生的甲胄缓缓走近我的王座。卫兵还没来得及缴械，[From.GetSheHe]就娴熟地夺过他们手上的长矛，丢在一边。其他卫兵匆忙赶上，但是我伸手制止了他们。这个陌生人是[From.GetTitledFirstName]，他终于从希腊回来了！

original: My [From.GetSonDaughter], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has finally returned home from Greece and [From.GetHerHis] service with the Varangian Guard! Although I can't quite put my finger on it, [From.GetSheHe] seems different somehow... and what is this Greek love he speaks of?
translation: 我的[From.GetSonDaughter][From.GetTitledFirstName]完成了[From.GetHerHis]瓦兰吉卫队的服役从希腊回来了！[From.GetSheHe]看起来变了很多，尽管我说不上来……[From.GetSheHe]言谈中对希腊的莫名喜爱是怎么回事？

original: No matter, I'm just glad [From.GetSheHe] made it home!
translation: 不管怎样，我很高兴[From.GetSheHe]回家了！

original: A frail, robed [From.GetManWoman] is led into my throne room, and the guards explain that [From.GetSheHe] just arrived on a ship coming from Miklagård. The [From.GetManWoman] would only speak my name over and over again, and so [From.GetSheHe] was brought to me. To my horror, I recognize [From.GetHerHim] at last as [From.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 一个穿着长袍的憔悴[From.GetManWoman]被带到我的房间。卫兵说[From.GetSheHe]刚乘船从米克拉加德回来。这个[From.GetManWoman]只是一遍又一遍重复着我的名字，所以[From.GetSheHe]被送过来了。我惊讶地发现[From.GetHerHim]居然是[From.GetTitledFirstName]！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has finally returned home after a long and successful career in the Varangian Guard! [From.GetSheHeCap] fought in several battles, and learned much from the clever strategies and tactics favored by both the Greeks and their enemies in Serkland.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]漫长而成功的瓦兰吉卫队生活之后光荣回家了！[From.GetSheHeCap]参加了好几场战斗，从希腊人和他们的敌人「长袍国度」塞尔克兰那里学到了大量的战略和战术技巧。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has returned from Greece and the Varangian Guard, but [From.GetSheHe] refuses to speak of [From.GetHerHis] experiences there. I know [From.GetSheHe] took part in several battles and killed many foes, but instead of reveling in the glory of [From.GetHerHis] accomplishments, [From.GetFirstName] is plagued by nightmares and jumps at sudden sounds.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]从希腊的瓦兰吉卫队回来了，但[From.GetSheHe]不愿意提及[From.GetHerHis]经历。我知道[From.GetSheHe]参加过好几次战斗，杀了不少敌军，但[From.GetFirstName]并没有陶醉于[From.GetHerHis]成就，反而被噩梦缠绕，会被突然的声响吓一跳。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has come home from Miklagård and [From.GetHerHis] service with the Varangian Guard, but [From.GetSheHe] is not alone. [From.GetSheHeCap] has found a Greek [From.GetHusbandWifeOpp] and brought [From.GetHerHimOpp] with [From.GetHerHim]. [From.GetSheHeCapOpp] is not familiar with our customs or language, and the climate does not seem to agree with [From.GetHerHimOpp], but [From.GetSheHeOpp] seems willing to make the best of [From.GetHerHisOpp] new home.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]结束了[From.GetHerHis]瓦兰吉卫队的生活，从米克拉加德回来了，但[From.GetSheHe]不是一个人。[From.GetSheHeCap]找了个希腊[From.GetHusbandWifeOpp]，[From.GetHerHimOpp]也跟着[From.GetHerHim]回来了。[From.GetSheHeCapOpp]并不熟悉我们的习俗和语言，[From.GetHerHimOpp]似乎也很不适应这边的气候，但[From.GetSheHeOpp]似乎很愿意适应[From.GetHerHisOpp]新家。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has returned from Miklagård and the Varangian Guard a changed [From.GetManWoman]. [From.GetSheHeCap] is wiser, more confident in [From.GetHerHis] own abilities and more knowledgeable in matters of war. It seems the time spent in Greece did [From.GetHerHim] good.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]从米克拉加德的瓦兰吉卫队回来，变成了完全不同的[From.GetManWoman]。[From.GetSheHeCap]变得更聪明，对[From.GetHerHis]战斗能力和知识也更加自信。[From.GetHerHim]在希腊的这几年似乎真的很值得。

original: Several former Varangian Guardsmen have recently returned home after serving the Greek [greek_king_or_queen.GetKingQueen], and they bring news most grave. My [From.GetSonDaughter], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has fallen in battle while campaigning in Serkland. They assure me that [From.GetSheHe] faced [From.GetHerHis] enemy with bravery and slew many, before their numbers overwhelmed [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 几个前瓦兰吉卫队成员最近在为希腊[greek_king_or_queen.GetKingQueen]服役结束后回来了，带来了沉重的消息。我的[From.GetSonDaughter][From.GetTitledFirstName]在与「长袍国度」塞尔克兰的战斗中倒下了。他们向你保证，[From.GetSheHe]非常英勇地面对[From.GetHerHis]敌人，在人数压倒[From.GetHerHim]之前杀了好多敌人……

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has at last returned from Greece on a longship filled with the spoils of war! Apparently the great [greek_king_or_queen.GetKingQueen] of the Greeks is generous to those who serve [greek_king_or_queen.GetHerHim] well, and there is gold here from all over the Greek realm, Serkland and beyond. My [From.GetSonDaughter] insists on sharing these riches with me, [From.GetHerHis] loving [Root.GetFatherMother].
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]带着满满一长船的战利品从希腊回来了！据说希腊人的伟大[greek_king_or_queen.GetKingQueen]对[greek_king_or_queen.GetHerHim]能干的手下非常慷慨，而且希腊、塞尔克兰乃至更远的国度遍地都是黄金。我的[From.GetSonDaughter]决定将这些财富和[From.GetHerHis]敬爱的[Root.GetFatherMother]共享。

original: The death of my [From.GetRootRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has urged me to depart Miklagård and leave the Varangian guard. I am returning home on a longship, filled with loot from our campaigns in Serkland. After a long and perilous journey back, my feet are now firmly planted on the soil of the land that is my birthright. The throne is mine.
translation: 听说了我[From.GetRootRelation][From.GetTitledFirstName]的死讯后，我带着一大堆战利品离开了瓦兰吉卫队和米克拉加德。回家的长船里装满了来自塞尔克兰战斗中获得的战利品。漫长又危险的旅程结束后，我的双脚已经站上了这片生我养我的土地。王位是我的了。

original: After many years in Greece, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has finally been released from [From.GetHerHis] service to the Varangian Guard and returned home. My son is a changed [From.GetManWoman], however. The old gods no longer hold any interest for him, and [From.GetSheHe] instead speaks incessantly of Christendom and the horrors that await those who refuse to convert...
translation: 在希腊呆了许多年之后，[From.GetTitledFirstName]结束了[From.GetHerHis]瓦兰吉卫队的服役回到了家。但他完全变了个[From.GetManWoman]，不再相信我们的神灵，相反[From.GetSheHe]不断的提及不信基督教所要受到的惩罚……

original: As I charge into the glade, I jump over the beast, now laying still on the ground. My opponent yelps, clearly worn out from [other_combatant.GetHerHis] previous fight. "Need to catch your breath, huh?" I snicker, hefting my [Root.GetDuelWeapon]. Then I hear an angry growl behind me. I turn, finding myself face to face with a furious [target_ruler.Capital.GetRegionalBigAnimal]...
translation: 当我冲进林间空地时，我跃过那只躺在地上的野兽。我的对手尖叫一声，显然[other_combatant.GetHerHis]精力在之前的战斗中耗尽了。「想喘口气，对吧？」我窃笑着掂着我的[Root.GetDuelWeapon]。突然我听到身后传来愤怒的咆哮声。我转过身发现自己与愤怒的[target_ruler.Capital.GetRegionalBigAnimal]面面相觑……

original: As a [Actor.Religion.GetName] Pagan, you can declare your intention to invade §Y[Recipient.GetTitledName]§!. You have two years to declare war, during which many adventurers will flock to your banner.
translation: 作为[Actor.Religion.GetName]信徒，你可以宣布有意向入侵§Y[Recipient.GetTitledName]§!。你有两年的时间来准备宣战，其间将会有大量的冒险之徒加入你的麾下。

original: There are those who say foul play took place this day...
translation: 有些人说今天的决斗有猫腻……

original: "You [GetRootFromInsult]!" the [enemy_commander.Culture.GetName] soldier yells as he charges at me, [enemy_commander.GetHerHis] expression more that of a wild animal than [enemy_commander.GetManWoman]. For a moment time stands still, as I am watching the movement of a shiny sword coming straight for my [GetBodyPartInjured].
translation: 「你这[GetRootFromInsult]！」敌方[enemy_commander.Culture.GetName]士兵叫骂着冲向我，[enemy_commander.GetHerHis]表情更像野兽而非一个[enemy_commander.GetManWoman]。僵持片刻后，我看到闪光的剑直直地朝我的[GetBodyPartInjured]砍来。

original: I am on the ground holding back tears...
translation: 我躺在地上试图忍住眼泪……

original: Taking advice from their cat as

My history in battle is known to many, but there are still those who could benefit from learning more about my experiences. "Like that time you chopped someone's head off?" [fellow_member.GetTitledFirstName] asks, in response to my idea. "A feast, where you regale your court with the stories!" [fellow_member.GetSheHe] continues. I consider the spirits it could lift, as I soon depart for [target_title.GetName].
translation: 吾一生征战，世人固知，但总有人愿意更多地了解我的经历从而受益。「就像那次你砍下了某人的脑袋？」[fellow_member.GetTitledFirstName]回应着我的想法。「举办一场宴会吧！用您的故事款待整个宫廷！」[fellow_member.GetSheHe]继续迎合。想到这种精神将被发扬，我马上出发去[target_title.GetName]。
